automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_office_wled_pulse_21_23'
alias: Living Room Light - Office WLED Pulse 21-23
description: "When Living Room light turns on between 21:00 and 23:00, pulse Office WLED at ~20% brightness for 10 seconds"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
